summary: This is an email from an attorney at Jeffrey S. Pop & Associates scheduling a telephone conference regarding an unspecified matter. The email contains standard confidentiality and attorney-client privilege disclaimers.

persons.name: Jeffrey S. Pop
persons.context: The law firm Jeffrey S. Pop & Associates is identified as the sender of this confidential email containing attorney-client privilege disclaimers.

events.title: Proposed Telephone Conference
events.description: A telephone conference is proposed for Friday, December 20, 2019, from 2:00pm to 5:00pm EST.

events.title: Alternative Proposed Telephone Conference
events.description: An alternative telephone conference is proposed for Monday, December 23, 2019, after 2:00pm EST.

locations: 9150 Wilshire Blvd., Suite 241 Beverly Hills, California 90212-3429
keyFacts: The document is a scheduling email from the law firm Jeffrey S. Pop & Associates.
The email proposes two potential times for a telephone conference in late December 2019.
The email contains strong confidentiality and attorney-client privilege disclaimers.
The document originates from the Epstein case files, suggesting a legal connection to the matter.
